Content: Welcome to LnG Clan! This is a competitive fortnite clan consisting of many good members. Please be respectful towards everyone and here are the requirements for each of the roles.NLNLTeam: 1.5kd NL100 wins+NLCompetitive NLScrim ExperienceNLNon toxicNLNLGFX: Experience with photoshop_ ability to create many pieces_ nice artworkNLNLContent Creator: 100+ subscribers/followers that are active_ not be a bot at fortniteNLNLVideo editor: Ability to edit YouTube videos and make intros and outrosNLNLCoach: Ability to coach people for the team if they are really interested but do not have proper statistics that meet requirementsNLNLRecruiter: A person willing to recruit many people with the right statistics_ be respectful to future membersNL @everyone  @here

Welcome to Reverse ClanNLServers: NAW_NAE_EUNLPlayers: Everyone isn’t toxic_ competitive_ a content creator_ and has some scrim experienceNLHow to join: Go on YouTube or Instagram and make a few RC’sNLNLexample: (youtube montage of good clips_ builds_ etc) #ReverseRC20NLNLLooking for GFX/ RecruitersNLNLDm me for questions!!
